name: SPARKS (Tamsoh)
description:
Run through a flying prison, using your powerful electric sword and dash to overcome obstacles and ennemies on your way !

KEY FEATURES
  • Use your powerful abilites to your advantage
  • Get rid of your ennemies with your boomerang sword
  • Parallax effect
  • 2D platform game
  • Fast actions and movements

Feel free to give me a feedback in comment ! ;)
